privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body:
Privacy Policy
(Art. 12 ff. GDPR & § 25 TTDSG)

1.1 Responsible Entity
Matbakh - Culinary Compass · Owner Rabieb Al Khatib
E-mail: write at rabibskii dot com

1.2 Purposes & Legal Bases of Processing

Data Category | Purpose | Legal Basis
Account Data (Email, Language Setting) | Registration, Login, Personalization | Art. 6 Para. 1 b) GDPR
Profile Information (Allergies, Goals) | Personalized Recipe & Nutrition Recommendations | Art. 6 Para. 1 b)
Usage Data (Page Views, Logs) | Error Analysis, Security Logs | Art. 6 Para. 1 f)
Cookies / LocalStorage | Session Management, Language, Consent Status | § 25 TTDSG, Art. 6 Para. 1 a)

1.3 Storage Duration
We store personal data only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or until you delete your account.

1.4 Recipients / Third Country Transfers

Service | Purpose | Data | Legal Basis / Transfer
Google Maps / Places-API | Map Display, Restaurant Search | IP Address, possibly Location, Browser Info | Art. 6 Para. 1 f) GDPR (legitimate interest in attractive presentation) · EU-USA Data Privacy Framework

Note on USA Transfer: Google also processes data in the USA. Google is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework. An adequate level of data protection is thus ensured.

Hosting & Database: Supabase (Server location EU)
Analysis & Error Tracking Services only with consent (Consent Banner)

1.5 Your Rights
You have the right to information, correction, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability and objection (Art. 15 – 21 GDPR). For this, contact write at rabibskii dot com.

1.6 Right to Complain to Supervisory Authority
Bavarian State Office for Data Protection Supervision (BayLDA), Promenade 18, 91522 Ansbach, Germany.

1.7 Google Maps
This website embeds map services from Google Maps to display restaurants near you. When calling up the map widget, (a) your IP address and (b) possibly location data are transmitted to Google. Data processing is based on Art. 6 Para. 1 f) GDPR (legitimate interest in user-friendly presentation). If you choose "Decline" in the cookie/consent banner, Google Maps will not be loaded.

Users can delete their account at any time. Matbakh reserves the right to block accounts for violations of these Terms & Conditions.

Matbakh reserves the right to change these Terms & Conditions with effect for the future. Changes will be communicated to users by email at least 14 days before they take effect.

German law applies. The exclusive place of jurisdiction is, where permissible, Munich.
